name: MEA Goa Cafe | Sundowner | Restaurant & Beach Club

reviews.review_text:
Recently I been to Goa n found this place called MEA....

It is one of  the best beach cafe in Goa .
Very luxurious restaurants with breath taking view of the sun downer and the beautiful beach.

The menu offers a variety of delicious and mouthwatering appetisers and main courses plus refreshing cocktails and mocktails.

The staff were very courteous and humble.

They have mesmerizing live dance performances,  wonderful DJ and fire works setting a perfect weekend mood.

It has a perfect atmosphere  to chill, vibe , eat,  dance, and enjoy with friends and family

üìçLocation: Football Ground, Uddo, Beach, Siolim, Goa 403517

This place is absolutely amazing! The food is delicious, the atmosphere is great, and it's a must-visit if you're planning a trip to Goa. It's the perfect spot to enjoy a beautiful sunset with you Buddies. They even have professional photographers who took pictures of our group. When we asked how to get the pictures, Manpreet shared her number with us and told us to check with her in 2-3 days. As promised, she shared the Google Drive link to our incredible pictures. Here are a few of them. The best part is that they didn't charge anything extra for the photos. Many thanks to Manpreet and Mea for providing such a delightful experience!

Best Sundowner Vibes.. We had a great Time with our family & got completely refreshed & Chilled with their Must try mocktails üçπüç∏

I must say do try Ginger lime & The pineapple one  too good üëåüëå
